Song.title: We Hunger And Thirst
Song.copyright: Words & Music by George Romanaccee and Alex Couch (C) 2011 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [A | C#m | B C#m | A (2X)]
VERSE 1: Ex[E]alted Son of g[F#m]lory [B]hum[C#m7]bly came [A]down [E]Wounded for the b[F#m]roken, [B]bore the s[C#m]inners cr[A]own [B] Through the w[C#m]illing death You d[A]ied [B] You be[C#m]came our bread of l[A]ife [| A]
CHORUS: [E]Jesus, we hunger and thirst for Y[B]ou, Lord As we remember Your s[A]acrifice [| A] [E]We see the wounds{,} from Your hands and p[B]ierced side Extravagant love, oh how g[A]reat the price [| A] [C#m]Now our l[B]ives are Y[A]ours [| C#m7 | B C#m | A]
VERSE 2: [E]The priceless blood of J[F#m]esus, t[B]his g[C#m7]racious c[A]up A l[E]ife spring overf[F#m]lowing,{,} [B]poured [C#m]out for [A]us [B] He has c[C#m]onquered every [A]sin [B] For the [C#m]ones who trust in H[A]im [| A]
CHORUS: [E]Jesus, we hunger and thirst for Y[B]ou, Lord As we remember Your s[A]acrifice [| A] [E]We see the wounds{,} from Your hands and p[B]ierced side Extravagant love, oh how g[A]reat the price [| A] [C#m]Now our l[B]ives are Y[A]ours [| C#m7 | B C#m | A]
{new_page} Verse 2: Your [E]body the bread, Your [F#m7]blood the wine B[E/G#]roken and poured out [A2(no3)]all for love The [E]whole earth trembled and the [F#m7]veil was torn [E/B] Love so a[A2(no3)]mazing [E/B] love so a[A2(no3)]mazing
Chorus: Jesus Mess[E]iah Name above [A2(no3)]all names Blessed Red[E]emer Emmanu[Bsus]el The Rescue for s[E]inners The Ransom from [A2(no3)]heaven Jesus Mess[E/G#]iah [Bsus] Lord of [E]all
BRIDGE: All our [F#m]hope is in Y[E/G#]ou All our [A2(no3)]hope is in [Bsus]You All the [F#m]glory to [E/G#]You God [A2(no3)] The Light of the w[Bsus]orld
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 exalted son of glory humbly came down wounded for the broken bore the sinners crown through the willing death you died you became our bread of life chorus jesus we hunger and thirst for you lord as we remember your sacrifice we see the wounds from your hands and pierced side extravagant love oh how great the price now our lives are yours verse 2 the priceless blood of jesus this gracious cup a life spring overflowing poured out for us he has conquered every sin for the ones who trust in him chorus jesus we hunger and thirst for you lord as we remember your sacrifice we see the wounds from your hands and pierced side extravagant love oh how great the price now our lives are yours verse 2 your body the bread your blood the wine broken and poured out all for love the whole earth trembled and the veil was torn love so amazing love so amazing chorus jesus messiah name above all names blessed redemer emmanuel the rescue for sinners the ransom from heaven jesus messiah lord of all bridge all our hope is in you all our hope is in you all the glory to you god the light of the world

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [A | C#m | B C#m | A (2X)]
VERSE 1: Ex[E]alted Son of g[F#m]lory [B]hum[C#m7]bly came [A]down [E]Wounded for the b[F#m]roken, [B]bore the s[C#m]inners cr[A]own [B] Through the w[C#m]illing death You d[A]ied [B] You be[C#m]came our bread of l[A]ife [| A]
CHORUS: [E]Jesus, we hunger and thirst for Y[B]ou, Lord As we remember Your s[A]acrifice [| A] [E]We see the wounds{,} from Your hands and p[B]ierced side Extravagant love, oh how g[A]reat the price [| A] [C#m]Now our l[B]ives are Y[A]ours [| C#m7 | B C#m | A]
VERSE 2: [E]The priceless blood of J[F#m]esus, t[B]his g[C#m7]racious c[A]up A l[E]ife spring overf[F#m]lowing,{,} [B]poured [C#m]out for [A]us [B] He has c[C#m]onquered every [A]sin [B] For the [C#m]ones who trust in H[A]im [| A]
BRIDGE: [F#m] The cup we d[E/G#]rink, the bread we [B]eat Reminds us [C#m]You are [B]all we n[A]eed And makes us [E]long{,} for Your wedding f[B]east [| B E/G#] (Repeat)
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 exalted son of glory humbly came down wounded for the broken bore the sinners crown through the willing death you died you became our bread of life chorus jesus we hunger and thirst for you lord as we remember your sacrifice we see the wounds from your hands and pierced side extravagant love oh how great the price now our lives are yours verse 2 the priceless blood of jesus this gracious cup a life spring overflowing poured out for us he has conquered every sin for the ones who trust in him bridge the cup we drink the bread we eat reminds us you are all we need and makes us long for your wedding feast repeat
